nodes.text: Do Not Bind His Hands was a Galactic Republic campaign propaganda poster produced by the Commission for the Protection of the Republic during the Clone Wars. Created by the artist Venthan Chassu, it depicted then-Supreme Chancellor Sheev Palpatine looking to the side in an impressive manner in front of the Republic symbol against a yellow background, with the font declaring "Do Not Bind His Hands", and below that, "Grant Him the Authority He Needs To Assure Total Victory", with "Victory" being written in a significantly larger manner than the rest of the sentence.
